alert.note: Alert for Leon; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 12 at 4:57PM EDT until March 12 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Southwestern Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 457 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated a severe thunderstorm capable of producing quarter size hail and damaging winds in excess of 60 mph. This storm was located 13 miles northwest of Crawfordville, and moving east at 35 mph. * Locations impacted include... Woodville, Crawfordville, St. Marks, Wakulla, Newport, Shadeville, Leon Sinks, Hyde Park, Wakulla Springs, Arran, Hilliardville, Tully, Vereen, Plum Orchard, Port Leon, Wakulla Beach, Bethel, Natural Bridge, Liveoak Island and Spring Creek. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for Big Bend of Florida.
info.instruction: Severe thunderstorms produce damaging winds, destructive hail, deadly lightning and very heavy rain. For your protection, move to an interior room on the lowest floor of your home or business. Heavy rains flood roads quickly so do not drive into areas where water covers the road.
